<li id="cite_note-455"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-455">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">达扬/石涛（德新社）. <a class="external text" href="http://www.dw.com/zh/%E8%B0%83%E7%A0%94%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%A8%E9%AB%98%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E9%A2%86%E5%9F%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B%E8%90%BD%E4%BC%8D/a-19260315" rel="nofollow">调研：德国在高科技研究领域开始落伍</a>. 德国之声. 2016-05-16 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-09-02</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160922202525/http://www.dw.com/zh/%E8%B0%83%E7%A0%94%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%A8%E9%AB%98%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E9%A2%86%E5%9F%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B%E8%90%BD%E4%BC%8D/a-19260315" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2016-09-22）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.atitle=%E8%B0%83%E7%A0%94%EF%BC%9A%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%A8%E9%AB%98%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E9%A2%86%E5%9F%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B%E8%90%BD%E4%BC%8D&amp;rft.au=%E8%BE%BE%E6%89%AC%2F%E7%9F%B3%E6%B6%9B%EF%BC%88%E5%BE%B7%E6%96%B0%E7%A4%BE%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=2016-05-16&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E4%B9%8B%E5%A3%B0&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dw.com%2Fzh%2F%25E8%25B0%2583%25E7%25A0%2594%25E5%25BE%25B7%25E5%259B%25BD%25E5%259C%25A8%25E9%25AB%2598%25E7%25A7%2591%25E6%258A%2580%25E7%25A0%2594%25E7%25A9%25B6%25E9%25A2%2586%25E5%259F%259F%25E5%25BC%2580%25E5%25A7%258B%25E8%2590%25BD%25E4%25BC%258D%2Fa-19260315&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-561"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-561">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080625100533/http://www.remid.de/remid_info_zahlen.htm" rel="nofollow">Religionen in Deutschland: Mitgliederzahlen</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-Eurobarometer_Languages-565"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Eurobarometer_Languages_565-0"><sup><b>209.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Eurobarometer_Languages_565-1"><sup><b>209.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a href="/wiki/%E6%AC%A7%E6%B4%B2%E8%81%94%E7%9B%9F%E5%A7%94%E5%91%98%E4%BC%9A" title="欧洲联盟委员会">European Commission</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://ec.europa.eu/public_opinion/archives/ebs/ebs_243_en.pdf" rel="nofollow">Special Eurobarometer 243: Europeans and their Languages (Survey)</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. <li id="cite_note-630"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-630">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20171010074914/http://www.buzer.de/s1.htm?g=Einigungsvertrag&amp;a=2" rel="nofollow">Artikel 2 EV - Vertrag zwischen der Bundesrepublik Deutschland und der Deutschen Demokratischen Republik über die Herstellung der Einheit Deutschlands (Einigungsvertrag - EV k.a.Abk.)</a>. buzer.de.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [15 May 2015-05015]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.buzer.de/s1.htm?g=Einigungsvertrag&amp;a=2" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2017-10-10） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到德语网页">（德语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.btitle=Artikel+2+EV+-+Vertrag+zwischen+der+Bundesrepublik+Deutschland+und+der+Deutschen+Demokratischen+Republik+%C3%BCber+die+Herstellung+der+Einheit+Deutschlands+%28Einigungsvertrag+-+EV+k.a.Abk.%29&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=buzer.de&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.buzer.de%2Fs1.htm%3Fg%3DEinigungsvertrag%26a%3D2&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span> <span class="error citation-comment" style="display:none;font-size:100%">请检查<code style="color:inherit; border:inherit; padding:inherit;">|access-date=</code>中的日期值 (<a href="/wiki/Help:%E5%BC%95%E6%96%87%E6%A0%BC%E5%BC%8F1%E9%94%99%E8%AF%AF#bad_date" title="Help:引文格式1错误">帮助</a>)</span></span>

<li id="cite_note-autogenerated1-665"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-autogenerated1_665-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130222070337/http://www.huntfor.com/arthistory/c19th/artnouveau.htm" rel="nofollow">Art Nouveau — Art Nouveau Art</a>. <li id="cite_note-697"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-697">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.btitle=Made+in+Germany%3A+The+most+important+games+from+Germany+%28German%29&amp;rft.date=2011-11-27&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22PC+Games+%28magazine%29%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22PC+Games+%28magazine%29%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3EPC+Games%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EPC+Games+%28magazine%29%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E+Hardware&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pcgameshardware.de%2FSpiele-Thema-239104%2FSpecials%2FDeutsche-Wertarbeit-681808%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-699"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-699">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110818094006/http://www.studiobabelsberg.com/service/filmstudios-ateliers/neue-film-1/" rel="nofollow">Studio Babelsberg</a> – <i>Mit der Erschließung des direkt in der Nachbarschaft befindlichen Filmgeländes mit den Studios Neue Film 1 und Neue Film 2 konnte Studio Babelsberg seine Studiokapazitäten verdoppeln und verfügt so über Europas größten zusammenhängenden Studiokomplex.</i>, retrieved 2013-12-03 (German)</span>

</div>
<h2><span id=".E5.A4.96.E9.83.A8.E9.80.A3.E7.B5.90"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="外部连结">外部连结</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD&amp;action=edit&amp;section=44" title="编辑章节：外部连结">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div aria-label="Portals" class="noprint portal plainlist tright" role="navigation" style="margin:0.5em 0 0.5em 1em;border:solid #aaa 1px">
<ul style="display:table;box-sizing:border-box;padding:0.1em;max-width:175px;background:#f9f9f9;font-size:85%;line-height:110%;font-weight:bold">

<nav aria-labelledby="p-tb-label" class="vector-menu mw-portlet mw-portlet-tb vector-menu-portal portal" id="p-tb" role="navigation">
<h3 class="vector-menu-heading" id="p-tb-label">
<span class="vector-menu-heading-label">工具</span>
</h3>
<div class="vector-menu-content">
<ul class="vector-menu-content-list"><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-whatlinkshere"><a accesskey="j" href="/wiki/Special:%E9%93%BE%E5%85%A5%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2/%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD" title="列出所有与本页相链的页面[j]"><span>链入页面</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-recentchangeslinked"><a accesskey="k" href="/wiki/Special:%E9%93%BE%E5%87%BA%E6%9B%B4%E6%94%B9/%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD" rel="nofollow" title="页面链出所有页面的更改[k]"><span>相关更改</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-upload"><a accesskey="u" href="/wiki/Project:%E4%B8%8A%E4%BC%A0" title="上传图像或多媒体文件[u]"><span>上传文件</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-specialpages"><a accesskey="q" href="/wiki/Special:%E7%89%B9%E6%AE%8A%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2" title="全部特殊页面的列表[q]"><span>特殊页面</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-permalink"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD&amp;oldid=73989302" title="此页面该修订版本的固定链接"><span>固定链接</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-info"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD&amp;action=info" title="关于此页面的更多信息"><span>页面信息</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-cite"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Special:%E5%BC%95%E7%94%A8%E6%AD%A4%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2&amp;page=%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD&amp;id=73989302&amp;wpFormIdentifier=titleform" title="关于如何引用本页的信息"><span>引用本页</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-wikibase"><a accesskey="g" href="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Special:EntityPage/Q183" title="链接到连接的数据仓库项目[g]"><span>维基数据项目</span></a></li></ul>
